libnetworkd::LogManager

list< LogFacility * > getLogFacilities ()

Detailed Description

The LogManager class is a container for registering logging facilities -- represented by a LogFacility instance -- and logging information to these facilities.

Member Function Documentation

void libnetworkd::LogManager::addLogFacility ( LogFacility *  logFacility  )  [virtual]

Add a new log facility to the chain of facilities being notified upon new messages to be logged.

Parameters:
[in] logFacility The facility being added.

void libnetworkd::LogManager::removeLogFacility ( LogFacility *  logFacility  )  [virtual]

Remove an already registered facility from the log chain.

Parameters:
[in] logFacility The facility to be removed.

void libnetworkd::LogManager::logFormatMessage ( const char *  format,
  ... 
) [virtual]

Globally log a message using printf style syntax. The rendered message will be send to all registered LogFacility instances.

Parameters:
[in] format A printf style format string.

void libnetworkd::LogManager::logMessage ( const char *  message  )  [virtual]

This function performs the same job as logMessage(format, ...) but is format string vulnerability safe and a little faster.

Parameters:
[in] message The message to be logged.
